attributes.action: Request That Translink In Northern Ireland Recognise The Pension Age of Women to be 60 and Grant them the same rights to a Bus Pass/Senior Smart Pass for Free Travel In Northern Ireland as men of pensionable age 65
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Women pensioners in Northern Ireland cannot get a Bus Pass/Senior SmartPass for Free Travel In Northern Ireland until they are 65 (Currently the recognised state pension age for men).

We the undersigned wish the Government to request Translink to give Equal Rights in respect of geting Free Travel Via Bus Pass/Senior SmartPass as men do at the State Pension Age of 65 - to Women Of The State Recognised Penson Age of 60.

Therefore letting women pensioners travel for FREE On Translink Services once they reach the age of 60 years old and NOT making women pensioners wait an extra 5 years longer until they reach the age of 65 years old for the same rights.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
